wizard.title: FACTOR Plugin
wizard.intro: Access your full OctoPrint portal, printer controls, camera streams, and plugins from anywhere! FACTOR works on your desktop, laptop, tablet, phone, and your favorite OctoPrint apps!
wizard.tagline: FACTOR is free, secure, and super easy to setup!

help.instructions: Visit factor.io.kr to register your device and complete setup.

setup.title: FACTOR Device Setup
setup.description: Visit the FACTOR website to register your device and complete setup.

help.title: How to Setup
help.step2: Login to your FACTOR account or create a new one
help.step3: Complete the device registration and configuration
help.step4: Your OctoPrint will be accessible remotely via FACTOR

message.not_subscribed: Connected but not subscribed - click Retry
message.no_instance_id: Device not registered - click 'Register Device' to start
message.disconnected: MQTT broker not connected - click Retry
